amendment.description: Amendment to reduce funding for the Office of the Secretary by $8,291,000 and to increase funding for the Forest Health Management Account by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 44 printed in the Congressional Record to increase FS state and private forestry by $8.291 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Reed amendment (A021) Agreed to by recorded vote: 237 - 189 (Roll no. 656).
